column1: '''Jenny Dolfen''' (born [[1975]]) is a German artist and teacher. She has created numerous illustrations inspired by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[legendarium]].
In [[2014]], Dolfen won the inaugural [[The Tolkien Society
column2: Tolkien Society]] award in the category "best artwork" in 2014, for her painting "[[:File:Jenny Dolfen - Earendil the Mariner.jpg
Songs of Sorrow and Hope: The Art of Jenny Dolfen]]''
